Html:
Hello ppl, as i try to run Rawr for my warrior with Scourge Stanglers (leather hands) always i got thats this item is not awailable. I did all in my short experience but still problem is not solved. Any advice to help me to optimize my warr with those hands please?

Thank you very much in advance

Sincerely Buio
In before Posting Guideline slam...though it's probably deserved in this post... English is not your primary language I take it?  Go open a a ticket in the Issue Tracker and give more detail.

yes m8 ure right, im not english. ill go there to have a look.

Thank you for your answer

Yes, this kind of issue belongs in the Issue Tracker, not the Discussions.  That said as I didn't notice a post by you in the Issue Tracker in regards to this, go to Tools > Refine Types of Items Listed, and check Leather and Mail.
